C-0187.name: Minimize wildcard use in Roles and ClusterRoles

C-0002.name: Prevent containers from allowing command execution

C-0187.name: Minimize wildcard use in Roles and ClusterRoles

C-0002.name: Prevent containers from allowing command execution
Prevent containers from allowing command execution

command: until (xenoncli xenon ping && xenoncli cluster add "$(/scripts/create-peers.sh)") > /dev/null 2>&1; do sleep 2; done

args:
# Generate mysql server-id from pod ordinal index.
ordinal=$(echo $(hostname) | tr -cd "[0-9]")
# Copy server-id.conf adding offset to avoid reserved server-id=0 value.
cat /mnt/config-map/server-id.cnf | sed s/@@SERVER_ID@@/$((100 + $ordinal))/g > /mnt/conf.d/server-id.cnf
# Copy appropriate conf.d files from config-map to config mount.
cp -f /mnt/config-map/node.cnf /mnt/conf.d/
cp -f /mnt/config-map/*.sh /mnt/scripts/
chmod +x /mnt/scripts/*
# remove lost+found.
rm -rf /mnt/data/lost+found
initContainers.name: init-mysql

controls.name: Prevent containers from allowing command execution
Minimize wildcard use in Roles and ClusterRoles
